The Portaria Hotel & Spa has been built to combine respect for the traditional architecture of Mt. Pelion with all modern comforts. It is located 12 km from Volos, 12 km from the Ski centre of Mt. Pelion and only 40 minutes away from the deep blue beaches of East Pelion: Agios Ioannis, Plaka and Papa Nero.
